Program Maps
============

.. note::

   In **Firefox**, you may not be able to view the maps directly because of **protection issues** with *mindmeister* cookies. Each Figure has a **Footnote with a hyperlink** to the original MindMap which you can use.

   However, if you wish to watch it on firefox: go to **settings** --> **Privacy & Security** --> Change **Enhanced Tracking Protection** from **Standard/Stric** to **Custom** --> Enable everything but in **Cookies** options select **Cross-site tracking cookies** instead of **Cross-site tracking cookies, and isolate others cross-site cookies**.



.. note::

   In **Chrome** can be the same.

   If you want to watch it: go to **settings** (chrome://settings/) --> search for **Cookies** in the "Search settings bar" --> go to **Cookies and other side data** --> Disable **Block third-party cookies**

   *There seems to be some instances with problems to display frames with Chrome even with the adjustments made before. If this is the case, try to use Firefox instead*
  


.. raw:: html

   <div>
   <h1>Program Main Map</h1>
   <p>The next map shows the main relationships between the different functions in the program:</p>
   <iframe width="700" height="400" frameBorder="0" src="https://www.mindmeister.com/maps/public_map_shell/2717250214/blaster-programming?width=700&height=400&z=0.2&live_update=1&no_share=1&no_logo=1" scrolling="no" style="overflow:hidden;margin-bottom:5px"></iframe>
   <div class="mb-5"><a href="https://www.mindmeister.com/2717250214/blaster-programming" target="_blank">BLASTER - Programming</a> by <a href="https://www.mindmeister.com/users/channel/97830512" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Francisco Pacheco Hinojosa</a>
   <br><br><p>If your browser is not able to display frames. Please visit <a href="https://www.mindmeister.com/2717250214/blaster-programming" target="_blank">BLASTER - Programming</a> on MindMeister.</p>
   </div>
   </div>

   <br><br>

   <div>
   <h1>Program Main Map with Arguments</h1>
   <p>The next map will show the same relationships as the one before, but instead of connections between functions, it will make them between its arguments:</p> 
   <iframe width="700" height="400" frameBorder="0" src="https://www.mindmeister.com/maps/public_map_shell/2750280366/blaster-arguments?width=700&height=400&z=0.2&live_update=1&no_share=1&no_logo=1" scrolling="no" style="overflow:hidden;margin-bottom:5px">Your browser is not able to display frames. Please visit <a href="https://www.mindmeister.com/2750280366/blaster-arguments" target="_blank">BLASTER Arguments</a> on MindMeister.</iframe><div class="mb-5"><a href="https://www.mindmeister.com/2750280366/blaster-arguments" target="_blank">BLASTER Arguments</a> by <a href="https://www.mindmeister.com/users/channel/97830512" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Francisco Pacheco Hinojosa</a>
   <br><br><p>If your browser is not able to display frames. Please visit <a href="https://www.mindmeister.com/2750280366/blaster-arguments" target="_blank">BLASTER Arguments</a> on MindMeister.</p>
   </div>
   </div>

   <br><br>

   <div>
   <h1>Program structured inside Modules</h1>
   <p>At last, this map will show something pretty similar to the first one here. But the functions will be grouped inside their modules, so the relationships between modules can be known:</p>
   <iframe width="700" height="400" frameBorder="0" src="https://www.mindmeister.com/maps/public_map_shell/2761825108/blaster-modules?width=600&height=400&z=0.2&live_update=1&no_share=1&no_logo=1" scrolling="no" style="overflow:hidden;margin-bottom:5px">Your browser is not able to display frames. Please visit <a href="https://www.mindmeister.com/2761825108/blaster-modules" target="_blank">BLASTER - Modules</a> on MindMeister.</iframe><div class="mb-5"><a href="https://www.mindmeister.com/2761825108/blaster-modules" target="_blank">BLASTER - Modules</a> by <a href="https://www.mindmeister.com/users/channel/97830512" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Francisco Pacheco Hinojosa</a>
   <br><br><p>If your browser is not able to display frames. Please visit <a href="https://www.mindmeister.com/2761825108/blaster-modules" target="_blank">BLASTER - Modules</a> on MindMeister.</p>
   </div>
   </div>
